mapper.sql: id as id, boxId as boxId, goodsName as goodsName
mapper.select: SELECT t1.id as id, t2.id as boxId, t3.id as areaId, t1.goodsName as goodsName, t2.boxName as boxName, t3.address as address FROM goods t1 LEFT JOIN box t2 ON t1.boxid = t2.id LEFT JOIN area t3 ON t2.areaId = t3.id where t1.id = #{goodsId}
